title: Executive - Customer Relationship Manager ( Panvel & Mulund )
tagsAndSkills: Customer Service,Payment Collection,Document Verification,Documentation,Payment Followup,Verification,Payments,Management
jobDescription:
Job Overview:
Seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Coordinator to manage customer relations, collections, and possession handovers. Key responsibilities include achieving collection targets, coordinating customer interactions, and ensuring smooth possession handovers.


Key Responsibilities:


  1. Achieving Collection Targets:
  • Follow up with customers for timely payments.
  • Maintain accurate financial records in software.
  • Monitor and meet weekly and quarterly collection

2. End-to-End Customer Coordination:

  • Serve as primary contact for customer inquiries.
  • Coordinate inter-departmentally for document submissions.
  • Resolve customer issues promptly and maintain records.

3. Document Preparation:

  • Demand letter generation
  • Reminder letters generation
  • Pre cancellation and cancellation letter preparation
  • Preparation of agreement for Sale
  • Payment entries in ERP
  • Updating routine trackers

Key Performance Indicators (KPIs):

  • Weekly and quarterly collection target achievement (%).
  • Turnaround Time (TAT) for email and documentation closure.
  • Customer feedback ratings.
  • TAT for possession handover completion

title: Opening For IT Infra in with Pharma at Thane
tagsAndSkills: I.T Infrastructure,LAN WAN configuration,Cyber Security,Networking,ZABIX implementation,ISP,SD WAN implementation,Link Failover monitoring

ambitionBoxData.Title: Alivira Animal Health Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Job Description

:

  • Minimum 8-9 years of experience in I.T Infrastructure, Cyber Security, Networking, LAN WAN configuration, ISP, SD WAN implementation, Link Failover monitoring, ZABIX implementation.
  • Server Administration experience of preferred brands like DELL, HP, Lenovo, Windows and Linux , Experience of handling DataCentre with SOC and NOC operations ensuring 99% up time of all I.T Infrastructure and Network. Hands on knowledge of Hyper-V on Windows.
  • Experience of Server Security / Application / System event log monitoring and initiate necessary actions on it. Windows Patch update experience.
  • Knowledge of Server H/W, WSUS, EDR concept and review, Antivirus, IP Sec tunneling. Good awareness of MPLS, VPN, SSL VPN, PRI connectivity, VLAN Configuration, Routing, Port Forwarding, Port blocking etc.
  • Preferred with O365 Administration knowledge, E-mail security like DLP, ATP. Knowledge of Backup tools and monitoring and review mechanism implementation.
  • Hands-on experience of Firewall maintenance and review of logs to initiate appropriate actions, Content Filtering, URL Filtering, Webproxy tools. Experience in handling ITGC Audits and VAPT Project implementation and appropriate CAPA of the VAPT observations.
  • Management and Support of Quality Control Pharma softwares, LIMS, DMS, QAMS, Chromeleon 7.2, Empower, TOC, FTIR, Malvern, UV, PLM etc.
  • Must knowledge of CSV, SOP preparation, Protocol and Report execution, I.T policy preparation and implementation, Business Continuity planning.
  • Good communication skills with key users and Vendor management, Coordination with Partners to close the Technical issues.
